badRequest: Invalid request. Please check your input.
deleteFailed: Failed to delete. Please try again.
forbidden: You don't have permission to access this resource.
loadFailed: Failed to load data. Please refresh the page.
network: Network error. Please check your internet connection.
networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
notFound: The requested resource was not found.
offline: You appear to be offline. Changes will sync when you're back online.
pageNotFoundDescription: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
saveFailed: Failed to save. Please try again.
serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
syncFailed: Sync failed. Your changes are saved locally.
unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
validationError: Please check your input and try again.
